customengraving.description: The flames of these candles writhe tentacularly in the damp air.

customengraving.description: The flames of these candles struggle against the dampness.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles have flickered their last in this soggy domain.

customblocker.name: Changing Station
customblocker.description: Some sort of magical altar or workbench or something. What they get changed into is unspecified.

customblocker.description: Equally suitable for eating a meal at or taking cover behind.

action.text: There are conspicuously zero underpants in this closet! Those gnomes you saw in the hallway must have taken them.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

custombreakable.name: Makeshift Wall
custombreakable.description: If you listen closely, you can hear a scratching on the bricks, as if someone where trying to claw through from the other side.

custombreakable.name: Cask of Sherry
custombreakable.description: The label says 'Amontillado', but it smells and tastes like Sherry to you.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: The Dwarven Educational System is well-known for two things: its efficiency, and having more teaching equipment made out of ferrous metal than any other civilization.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: The Dwarven Educational System is well-known for two things: its efficiency, and having more teaching equipment made out of ferrous metal than any other civilization.

customengraving.name: Brass Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to discover a secret.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Stubbornly refuses to let you in until you learn how locks work.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

action.text: Praise be to Inconsequentia, Goddess of the Perpetual Fetch Quest.

customblocker.name: Keep Fingers Clear
customblocker.description: Only the fingerless man shall pass. The fingerless man follows in the boney fingerprints of Lord Dredmor.

customblocker.name: Warning: Do Not Back Up
customblocker.description: Severe finger damage may occur.

action.text: Ouch! Watch your fingers!

customblocker.name: Grave of Banjo
customblocker.description: Here lies Banjo the Locquacious, mage supreme, and beloved by bears for reasons inexplicable. He accidentally stepped into a mysterious portal, and was killed by a slime. Again.

customengraving.name: Brass Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to discover a secret.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate refuse to let you pass.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

action.text: The iron bars retract into the wall.
With a satisfying click, the key turns, and a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: Here lies Borg, son of Picard.

customblocker.name: Grave of Red
customblocker.description: Here lies Red. He died that others, more important than himself, might live.

customblocker.name: Grave of Kirok
customblocker.description: Behold the god who bleeds. He bled his last.

customblocker.name: Grave of Juan
customblocker.description: The needs of the many, outweigh the needs of the few. Or the Juan.

customblocker.name: Jim
customblocker.description: He's a dead Jim.

customblocker.name: Bits of the Dead
customblocker.description: The bones have been gnawed on repeatedly over the years.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: You can hear rats scurrying in the hollows behind this wall.

customblocker.name: Burning Brazier
customblocker.description: All the scented candles in this room seem to be to compensate for the burning-hair and roasting pork scent from this brazier.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is orange blossom.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is cinnamon.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is lavender.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is pleasantly fruity.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is pine, with a hint of berry.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Relax. There's nothing the least bit suspicious about this room.

action.text: Jinkies! Somebody jinxed me!
Jinkies! Somebody jinxed me!

customblocker.name: Iron Bars of Inflation
customblocker.description: The Dwarven Economy is in dire straights if they are using iron bars to guard against the theft of plastic.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Remember kids, just say 'no' to powdered aluminum

customblocker.name: Plethran Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: Here lies Plethra, interred with the armour she brought into this world. Gaze in awe.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: The tiny holes in this imitation-wood grate allow reverent dwarven children to peer into the Tomb of Plethra herself. No doubt a few got so distracted they fell in the goo-hole below it.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: You can look, but you can't touch the sacred relics...unless you know how levers work. Luckily, dwarven children are a little slow.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: In a more glorious age, throngs of dwarven children would line up to peer through these bars, and murmur softly about polyurethane lamination.

pedestal.name: Historical Marker
pedestal.text: Here lies Plethra Suedehammer, inventor of the armour that saved more lives than all others in the history of our people.

action.text: The gate-cogs squeak and squeal as the bars slide aside. An invaluable trophy of dwarven armourial artistry awaits you!

customblocker.name: Keypad
customblocker.description: The sign next to these buttons suggests they are supposedly somehow capable of locking the air. It's either magic or nonsense.

customengraving.name: Bronze Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to discover a secret.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate refuse to let you pass.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

action.text: With a satisfying click, the key turns, and a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: The coppery appendage of a thing from beyond the mortal realm. Thankfully, it's programmed to sort and assemble, not 'kill all humans'.

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: A mechanical arm, for some sort of construction task. Seems harmless, but a little creepy.

customblocker.name: Mechanical Greeter
customblocker.description: A friendly-enough chap, it seems to want to shake hands. Nametag identifies it as 'Waldo.'

customblocker.name: Enormous Auto-Wrench
customblocker.description: Oh, the bolts you could turn with a wrench like this! Sadly, not the bolts that attach it to the floor.

customblocker.name: Agar Aguardpost
customblocker.description: 'Dredmor commands you to aguard this wall with your gelatinous lives. Let nothing penetrate its slimy surfaces.'

customblocker.name: Allergen Warning
customblocker.description: 'WARNING: Wall produced in a facility that also processes shellfish, peanuts, diggle eggs, and small puppies.'

customblocker.name: Rocky Alien Terrain
customblocker.description: This rock formation kinda looks like it's made out of styrofoam.

action.text: One to beam up! ...Just be thankful this wasn't a time-travel episode. You don't want to even see the Nazi Diggles.

customblocker.name: Welcome to Octo Oubliettes
customblocker.description: Octo Oubliette Agoraphobe Apartments. For when you just want to crawl inside a dark dank hole.

customblocker.name: Vegi Day Care
customblocker.description: Dredmor may be evil, but at least he doesn't skimp on employee benefits.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Towels
customblocker.description: Nice and fluffy, perfect for toweling off at the pool.

customblocker.name: Towels
customblocker.description: Nice and fluffy, perfect for toweling off at the pool.

customblocker.name: Towels
customblocker.description: Still a little damp from the previous user.

customengraving.name: Puddle
customengraving.description: Careful, the changing room floor is sometimes slippery.

action.text: There are conspicuously zero underpants in this closet! Those gnomes you saw by the pool must have taken them. No wonder they were so jiggy!

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: Hands to halyards, me mateys!

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: How do ye like the cut of me jib?

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: It's actually a four-masted frigate, but the third mast went mizzen.

customblocker.name: Ship's Wheel
customblocker.description: No matter how much you spin it, the ship never seems to move.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

loot.subtype: My Little Anvil Junior Smithing Kit

customblocker.name: Iron Bars
customblocker.description: You can't get to that iron, because there's this other iron in the way.

customblocker.name: Steel Grate
customblocker.description: A sturdy barrier made of high-grade tensile steel, just like what you could make if you had access to everything in this room.

customblocker.name: Rusted Minecart
customblocker.description: This broken old minecart is rusted to the spot.

customblocker.name: Rusted Minecart
customblocker.description: A corroded metal cart covered in messy diggle flipperprints.

customblocker.name: Rusted Minecart
customblocker.description: Some sort of horrific children's ride, a cart on a track perpetually orbiting Dredmor's dissaproving visage.

custombreakable.name: Collapsed Tunnel
custombreakable.description: A cave-in has sealed this tunnel. Hopefully no one was trapped behind solid rock.

customblocker.name: Bacon of Hope
customblocker.description: Salted, cured, and stored in this vault deep underground as a precaution against future crisis.

action.name: Distress Bacon
action.description: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

action.text: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

action.name: Distress Bacon
action.description: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

action.text: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

action.description: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

action.text: The bacon has been lit! Gondor calls for eggs!

customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles

customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Brass Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to unlock secrets.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate refuse to let you pass.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate refuse to let you pass.

customengraving.name: Silver Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to unlock secrets.

action.text: The gate guard slumps over dead, triggering the opening of the gates.
When you place the key in the lock, a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.
When you place the key in the lock, a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: So hot to the touch the metal has expanded slightly and jammed itself in the locked position.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate have been fused in place by the heat.

customblocker.name: Lava Pipe
customblocker.description: An ominously rattling, and somewhat scorched pipe. Used, no doubt, for some sort of slant-drilling operation to steal lava out from the next Dungeon over.

customblocker.name: Lava Pipe
customblocker.description: This super-heated pipe is painful to touch, even just for a second. Probably best to keep your distance.

pedestal.name: Strategic Lava Reserve
pedestal.text: Strategic Lava Reserve. This facility secured against the impending Peak Lava Crisis. Restricted Area. Trespassers will be smelted.

customengraving.name: Evil Ring Deposit Chute
customengraving.description: Insert semiprecious evil jewelry here for disposal.

action.text: Our semi-precious!
My semi-precious!

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: The coppery appendage of a thing from beyond the mortal realm. Thankfully, it's programmed to sort and assemble, not 'kill all humans'.

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: A mechanical arm, for some sort of construction task. Seems harmless, but a little creepy.

customblocker.name: Mechanical Greeter
customblocker.description: A friendly-enough chap, it seems to want to shake hands. Nametag identifies it as 'Waldo.'

customblocker.name: Enormous Auto-Wrench
customblocker.description: Oh, the bolts you could turn with a wrench like this! Sadly, not the bolts that attach it to the floor.

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: Built by the 3M Company: Menacing Mechanical Monstrosities, Incorporated. Mmmaybe find another way around?

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: A mechanical arm, for some sort of deconstruction task. Try not to get too close.

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: The coppery appendage of a thing from beyond the mortal realm. It's programmed to separate your components.

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: The mechanical arm bears an inscription like a tattoo. It reads: Destroy All Humans.

action.text: The mechanical arms swarm you and tear pieces off of you with such dizzying speed you can't even see their motion.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: Some sort of summoner's circle, drawn on the floor in flourescent fingernail polish.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: A thin layer of frost has formed over these arcane symbols. Standing near them makes you shiver.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: These magical glyphs appear to be drawn in edible body paint. From the scent, you'd guess it's Black Cherry flavor.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: Is this really a mystical summoning glyph, or just a disgusting old wad of cinnamon-flavored chewing gum?

action.text: Some foul magick has summoned a mixed horde of hideous demons from the nether realms!
The unstoppable killing machine is finally dead, at least until the inevitable sequel.

action.name: Ahnuld Thumb
action.description: Oh, great. They've already given the thumbs up to plan to make another one.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: A short alchemy workbench, stocked with the tools of the trade.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of pungent sludge, some of which was still bottled when you got here.

customblocker.name: Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: An alchemy workbench, with a hidden drawer for stashing bottles of moonshine.

customblocker.name: Alchemist's Furnace
customblocker.description: This once-mighty furnace is coated with the toxic residues left over from the transformation of baser matter into more noble elements.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: It's mostly a table. You were expecting that. What you weren't expecting is the fine yet foul powder dusting the tabletop.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customblocker.name: Stone Column
customblocker.description: A sturdy column of ancient stone.

customblocker.name: Stone Column
customblocker.description: A sturdy column of ancient stone.

customblocker.name: Cthonic Throne
customblocker.description: A throne so ancient its original owner has long since left this world, and the memories of mankind.

customblocker.name: Stone Column
customblocker.description: A sturdy column of ancient stone.

customblocker.name: Stone Column
customblocker.description: A sturdy column of ancient stone.

customblocker.name: Cursed Springs
customblocker.description: The inscription relates a 'very tragic tale of young diggle who drown here 1000 year ago.'

action.text: Oh, no! You've fallen into the cursed springs of Jusenkyo, and been transformed by their magic.

customengraving.name: Judge's Chair
customengraving.description: Imperious. Commanding. Corrupted.

customblocker.name: Witness Box
customblocker.description: Only a very small witness could fit inside that thing with the lid on.

customblocker.name: Judge's Desk
customblocker.description: A solid wooden desk, 3 sizes larger than is strictly necessary.

customblocker.name: Judge's Desk
customblocker.description: A solid wooden desk, 3 sizes larger than is strictly necessary.

customblocker.name: Judge's Desk
customblocker.description: A solid wooden desk, 3 sizes larger than is strictly necessary.

customengraving.name: Juror's Seats
customengraving.description: Good luck finding 12 impartial jurors in the dungeon. 12 angry monsters? That's more likely.

customblocker.name: Defendant's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Defendant's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Defendant's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Prosecutor's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Prosecutor's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Prosecutor's Table
customblocker.description: Just here for the benefit of the Magical Lawyers.

customblocker.name: Defendant's Chair
customblocker.description: The legal system here in the dungeon is far from lenient, nor is it gentle. And let's not bring up fair at all.

custombreakable.name: Railing
custombreakable.description: A thin railing to keep the angry jurors from descending on the court.

custombreakable.name: Railing
custombreakable.description: A thin railing to keep the angry jurors from descending on the court.

action.text: Tear down the wall!
Tear down the wall!
Tear down the wall!

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: OMG is that Triangulon? Makes me wish I was just a little more equilateral, if you know what I mean.

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: Triangulon! It's the picture from when he was on the cover of Mathemagic Beat!

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: This picture of triangulon is covered with lipstick stains.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: My heart skips a beat when I think that about how triangulon's famously angular lips may have touched this bottle.

customengraving.name: Triangular Indicators
customengraving.description: What do they indicate? That someone must really like triangles.

action.text: The cheese stands alone...
You have been baited into a trap!

customblocker.name: Triangle From Beyond
customblocker.description: Touching this makes your eyes hurt. Looking at it makes your skin crawl.

customengraving.name: Triangular Ports
customengraving.description: A charging port for triangulonic drones.

customengraving.name: Plastic Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to addend the crownstar.

customblocker.name: Crownstar Matrix
customblocker.description: A detailed holographic scan of the Crownstar itself, stored upon a cubic zirconium matrix with the single purpose of grading and authenticating the provenance of The Crownstar itself. NM-M 9.8, if you're wondering.

customblocker.name: Editing Cube
customblocker.description: Addending Device. Just made a little tiny change there, to improve on the original.

action.text: With a satisfying click, the key turns, and a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.
An alarm sounds in response to your theft. Prepare to be extinguished.

customengraving.name: Brass Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to discover a secret.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the grate refuse to let you pass.

customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Silver Keyhole
customengraving.description: Place key in hole to unlock secrets.

action.text: A heavy scraping sound in the distance suggests a door somewhere has opened.
With a satisfying click, the key turns, and a secret door opens! One quest ends, another begins.
The voice of Krong echoes out. Prove your steel, mortal, or I shall hammer thee!

customblocker.name: Copper Grate
customblocker.description: The sturdy copper grate refuses to let you pass.

action.text: The grate guard crashes to the ground with a thud, triggering the opening of the grates.

customengraving.name: Triangular Nests
customengraving.description: A charging port for triangulonic drones.

customengraving.name: Triangular Nests
customengraving.description: A charging port for triangulonic drones.

customengraving.name: Triangular Indicators
customengraving.description: It seems to be counting the number of hovering triangles in the room.

customblocker.name: Triangle From Beyond
customblocker.description: They just hover there, with no obvious sign of what's keeping them aloft.

customblocker.name: Triangle From Beyond
customblocker.description: They just hover there, with no obvious sign of what's keeping them aloft.

customblocker.name: Triangle From Beyond
customblocker.description: They just hover there, with no obvious sign of what's keeping them aloft.

customblocker.name: Tree Sloth
customblocker.description: A truly unhasty tree.

customblocker.name: Tech Tree
customblocker.description: This tree is logged on.

customblocker.name: Tree Totaller
customblocker.description: This tree will just have a tall water. It's not a Wizard Tree.

customblocker.name: Poplar Tree
customblocker.description: Voted Queen of the Arbor Day Prom.

customblocker.name: Athletic Tree
customblocker.description: Training for the Tree-athalon is hard work. Maybe it'll just sit this one out.

customblocker.name: Guard Tree
customblocker.description: Don't worry. It's bark is worse than its bite.

custombreakable.name: The Red Door of the House of Lies
custombreakable.description: Either thats not a lemon tree, or we're not in Braavos.

customblocker.name: Lemon Tree?
customblocker.description: A tree of sour truths. Luckily, such fruits don't grow in Braavos.

monster.name: First Sword of Braavos and Loan

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: A plaque beneath the screen promises to show images of someone named Prince Hbo, but all you see is Snow.

customblocker.name: Burning Brazier
customblocker.description: All the scented candles in this room seem to be to compensate for the burning-hair and roasting pork scent from this brazier.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is orange blossom.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is cinnamon.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is lavender.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is pleasantly fruity.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Lovely scented candles. This one is pine, with a hint of berry.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Relax. There's nothing the least bit suspicious about this room.

action.text: This is the curse that never ends!
This is the curse that never ends!
This is the curse that never ends!
This is the curse that never ends!
This is the curse that never ends!
Jinkies! Somebody jinxed me!

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: Not that you've ever seen a monster use a weapon.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: That monster almost thought of picking up a weapon here.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: One of these days, a monster will pick up a weapon, and then you'll be sorry.

customengraving.name: Plastic Keyhole
customengraving.description: Store closed until I find my misplaced keys. -Brax.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Stubbornly refuses to let you in until you learn how locks work.

action.text: Careful inside that shop. The proprietor-demon takes shop security very seriously.

customblocker.name: Bars on the Windows
customblocker.description: This shop takes security seriously.

customblocker.name: Bars on the Window
customblocker.description: This shop takes security seriously.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Old growth, a home to many monsters.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Beware of evil lurking in the uppermost branches.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Just a tree. No, really. Relax. It's just a tree.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Annoyingly standing in the way of the big fireball you wanted to shoot across the room.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Room full of monsters, and you stop to read the tree description. I applaud your 'smell the roses' prioritization.

customblocker.name: Tree
customblocker.description: Maybe you can get a monster to chase you around it, like one of those old cartoons.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles writhe tentacularly in the damp air.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles cast foreshadows about the room.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Just enough light to read entrails by.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: It's not like you're reading whatever I write about these candles, anyway.

customblocker.name: Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames burn with rage.

customblocker.name: Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames burn with rage.

customblocker.name: Pillar of Pain
customblocker.description: The eyes on the statue seem to follow you as you move about the room.

customblocker.name: Pillar of Pleasure
customblocker.description: Don't look too closely at the little details. They're quite naughty.

customblocker.name: Painting of Pindiggle
customblocker.description: He has such sights to show you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Just enough light to read entrails by.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Might be better to blow out the candles so you don't have to see it.

customblocker.name: Suspicious Bloodstain
customblocker.description: It probably just your eyes playing tricks on you, but it almost seems like the floor is drinking that blood.

customblocker.name: Viscera
customblocker.description: The remains of someone who should have stuck to crossword puzzles.
